snippet: An exhibition at the British Library explores how people around the world have harnessed the 1215 charter in pressing for individual liberties.
abstract: British Library, London, commemorates Magna Carta's 800th anniversary with six-month exhibit Magna Carta: Law, Liberty, Legacy.
lead_paragraph: An exhibition at the British Library explores how people around the world have harnessed the 1215 charter in pressing for individual liberties.

headline.main: In ‘Magna Carta: Law, Liberty, Legacy,’ a Document Resonates
headline.print_headline: From England to Africa, It’s Everyone’s Magna Carta
